TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IExtenderListService

Docs.summary: Provides an interface that can list extender providers.

remarks.format:
## Remarks A site can implement this service if it wants to provide a list of extender providers. By default, the list of extenders is generated by querying each component in the container that implements <xref:System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider> for the extenders each provides. By implementing this interface on a component site, a container can override the list of providers.
## Examples The following example demonstrates using the IExtenderListService to obtain the set of currently active extender providers.
[!code-vb[ExtenderListServiceExample#1](../../add/codesnippet/VisualBasic/t-system.componentmodel._146_1.vb)] [!code-cs[ExtenderListServiceExample#1](../../add/codesnippet/CSharp/t-system.componentmodel._146_1.cs)] [!code-cpp[ExtenderListServiceExample#1](../../add/codesnippet/CPP/t-system.componentmodel._146_1.cpp)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider[] GetExtenderProviders() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the set of extender providers for the component.
Docs.returns: An array of type that lists the active extender providers. If there are no providers, an empty array is returned.
Docs.value: An array of type that lists the active extender providers. If there are no providers, an empty array is returned.
